segment.source: Get the information you need to get started using the Microsoft advertising libraries to add banner and video interstitial ads to your apps.
segment.target: Get the information you need to get started using the Microsoft advertising libraries to add banner and video interstitial ads to your apps.

segment.source: Get started with the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Get started with the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Get started with the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Get started with the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: This topic provides the information you need to get started using the Microsoft advertising libraries to add banner and video interstitial ads to your apps.
segment.target: This topic provides the information you need to get started using the Microsoft advertising libraries to add banner and video interstitial ads to your apps.

segment.source: After you have read the topics in this section, move on to the developer walkthroughs to see examples about how to write the code that will show ads in your apps.
segment.target: After you have read the topics in this section, move on to the developer walkthroughs to see examples about how to write the code that will show ads in your apps.

segment.source: For complete sample projects that demonstrate how to add banner and video interstitial ads to JavaScript/HTML apps and XAML apps using C# and C++, see the advertising samples on GitHub.
segment.target: For complete sample projects that demonstrate how to add banner and video interstitial ads to JavaScript/HTML apps and XAML apps using C# and C++, see the advertising samples on GitHub.

segment.source: Important The Microsoft advertising libraries are a different set of extensions from the ad mediation libraries.
segment.target: Important The Microsoft advertising libraries are a different set of extensions from the ad mediation libraries.

segment.source: Use the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries if you want to display banner or video interstitial ads from Microsoft in a XAML or JavaScript app.
segment.target: Use the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries if you want to display banner or video interstitial ads from Microsoft in a XAML or JavaScript app.

segment.source: Use the AdMediatorControl class in the ad mediation libraries if you want to display banner ads from multiple ad networks in a XAML app.
segment.target: Use the AdMediatorControl class in the ad mediation libraries if you want to display banner ads from multiple ad networks in a XAML app.

segment.source: For more information, see What is the difference: AdMediatorControl or AdControl.
segment.target: For more information, see What is the difference: AdMediatorControl or AdControl.

segment.target: What is the difference: AdMediatorControl or AdControl

segment.target: Describes the differences between the AdControl class in the Microsoft advertising libraries and the AdMediatorControl class in the ad mediation libraries.
